summary: The diff implements the requested brand rename to “Lowkey Luxurious” (AuthGate, Shop Home header, and HTML document title), updates under-budget labels to “Under ₹500/Under ₹1000”, updates under-budget collection slugs and filtering logic to 500/1000 INR thresholds, and raises default price-range filter state (and related UI defaults) to [0, 2000] on CollectionPage/SearchPage to prevent higher-priced items being hidden by default.
